item.title: Game Legend John Romero Joins as Advisor, Talks Corona SDK
item.dc:creator: walter
item.description: Today, I'm super happy to announce that John Romero has joined as an advisor! John has had an extremely prolific career across over a hundred games, including the iconic works Wolfenstein 3D, DOOM and Quake. He has seemingly boundless energy. He's not only working on new games, but he's also teaching classes in mobile game development and is a tireless advocate for indie game development.
item.content:encoded:
Today, I’m super happy to announce that John Romero has joined as an advisor! John has had an extremely prolific career across over a hundred games, including the iconic works Wolfenstein 3D, DOOM and Quake. He has seemingly boundless energy. He’s not only working on new games, but he’s also teaching classes in mobile game development and is a tireless advocate for indie game development.

I recently sat down with John to talk about his experiences, perspective on the industry, the challenges facing game developers today, and (of course) what he loves about Corona. Here are highlights from that conversation:
